headline: Something You'd Like To Share With The Whole Class, JD Vance?
author: Evan Hurst
sentences: We are, whether we like it or not, the party of lower-income, lower-education white people, and I have been saying for a long time that we need to offer those people SOMETHING (and hell, maybe even expand our appeal to working class black people in the process) or a demagogue would.

Vance F*ckable Enough To Endorse
Of course, the story of how Vance is an opportunistic grifter who used to hate Donald Trump but suddenly decided to love Donald Trump for grifter purposes is nothing new.
We feel like it was only yesterday when Wonkette was discussing how Donald Trump had surveyed the field of lunatics and losers in the Ohio GOP Senate primary and said, "I pick THAT ONE.
